dtconsole

Class Site

  • java.lang.Object
    • dtconsole.Site
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Site
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Site represents a potential dengue site to be used in the DengueFighter game.The sites are created with randomly generated values for the attributes.A constant is used for the infection rate.Current infection rate used is 0.15 - 0.27 in Selangor (Ridpest)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Site()
      Only constructor without arguments provided.A Random object is used to automatically generate random values for some of the various attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateResourceUsage(int week)
      activate the purchased resource of the week which are stored in resource usage
      ResourceUsage findResourceUsage(Resource resource, int week)
      find the resource resource usage of the week
      Grade getCleanliness()
      Cleanliness is graded by enum type Grade
      int getNumInfected()
      Returns the number of infected people in the population.People who are infected will not be included in the calculation of the revenue.
      int getPopulation()
      Returns population of the site.Assume that the population, once generated, remains the same.
      static java.lang.String getResourceUsage(int weekNo)
      A method to review the resources used by the site as stored in the ResourceUsage ArrayList.
      static java.util.ArrayList<ResourceUsage> getResourceUsageList()
      retrieve the resource usage array list
      double getRevenue()
      Get the weekly revenue of uninfected workers, which is the product of the revenue per worker and the number of the uninfected population
      double getRevenuePerWorker()
      The average revenue per worker is randomly generated when the site is instantiated.
      java.lang.String getSiteID()
      The siteID uniquely identifies the site.Starts with "S".
      double getX()
      retrieve the x position of the site
      double getY()
      retrieve the y position of the site
      boolean hasAedes()
      Returns whether the Site has Aedes or not.You may want to make it private
      boolean recordResourceUsage(int weekNo, int numUnitsPurchased, Resource resource, Site site)
      A method to record the usage of a resource at this site.A resourceUsage is created and added to the collection, if the resource has not already been added for the week.
      static java.util.ArrayList ResourcePurchasedForWeek(int week, Site s)
      retrieve resource purchased for week base on week and site input
      void setCleanliness(Grade cleanliness)
      This method is used to reset the cleanliness value of the population.Cleanliness values take on the enumerated type Grade
      void setHasAedes(boolean hasAedes)
      Reset the hasAedes value to true if Aedes is present, false otherwise.
      void setNumInfected(int numInfected)
      Set the number of people infected in the population.
      void setResourceUsage(int weekNo, int numUnitsPurchased, Resource resource, Site site)
      set the purchased resource into the resource usage
      void setRevenuePerWorker(double revenuePerWorker)
      The revenue per worker can be recalculated if productivity decreases.(Productivity is affected by the toxicity of pesticides)
      java.lang.String toString() 
      void updateInfections()
      A method to update the number of infected people.The probability of infection is calculated based on: whether there is Aedes present the infection rate the number of people currently infected the cleanliness of the site This method should be called at the beginning of each week.

      • getResourceUsage

        public static java.lang.String getResourceUsage(int weekNo)
        A method to review the resources used by the site as stored in the ResourceUsage ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        weekNo - integer week
        Returns:
        gerResourceUsage a String containing a list of all the resources used for the site so far.

      • updateInfections

        public final void updateInfections()
        A method to update the number of infected people.The probability of infection is calculated based on:
        • whether there is Aedes present
        • the infection rate
        • the number of people currently infected
        • the cleanliness of the site
        This method should be called at the beginning of each week.

      • getRevenuePerWorker

        public double getRevenuePerWorker()
        The average revenue per worker is randomly generated when the site is instantiated.
        Returns:
        the average revenue per worker

      • setRevenuePerWorker

        public void setRevenuePerWorker(double revenuePerWorker)
        The revenue per worker can be recalculated if productivity decreases.(Productivity is affected by the toxicity of pesticides)
        Parameters:
        revenuePerWorker - the revenuePerWorker to set

      • recordResourceUsage

        public boolean recordResourceUsage(int weekNo,
                                   int numUnitsPurchased,
                                   Resource resource,
                                   Site site)
        A method to record the usage of a resource at this site.A resourceUsage is created and added to the collection, if the resource has not already been added for the week.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to be added
        site - the site to be added
        numUnitsPurchased - the number of units of resource
        weekNo - the week number that the resource is added
        Returns:
        true if the resource is added successfully
